author: radekkapka
content:
I reinstalled the kurtosis-cli and I am on version 1.10.2 now, but I can't start the engine
```
Error:  An error occurred running the pre-validation-and-run function
  Caused by: An error occurred creating a new Kurtosis engine client
  Caused by: An error occurred starting the engine with the engine existence guarantor
  Caused by: An error occurred guaranteeing that a Kurtosis engine is running
  Caused by: An error occurred launching the engine server container
  Caused by: An error occurred launching the engine server container with default version tag '1.10.2'
  Caused by: An error occurred launching the engine server container
  Caused by: An error occurred creating the engine using image 'kurtosistech/engine' with tag '1.10.2' and debug mode 'false'
  Caused by: An error occurred attempting to create logging components for engine with GUID '291229edcd104b21a189b7f26ed1645c' in Docker network with network id 'e6785646b8f004f8b6f6d52bb7888d348877b467a836bc77ac67c3e06b6a20c9'.
  Caused by: An error occurred getting existing logs aggregator.
  Caused by: An error occurred getting the logs Aggregator object using container ID '7ac5ee8c9216850ae4ebbadf900f6e619d5d0a90cdf377e1120239555c23e8cf', labels 'map[com.kurtosistech.app-id:kurtosis com.kurtosistech.container-type:kurtosis-logs-aggregator]' and the status 'running'
  Caused by: An error occurred getting the logs collector container's private port specs from container '7ac5ee8c9216850ae4ebbadf900f6e619d5d0a90cdf377e1120239555c23e8cf' with labels: map[com.kurtosistech.app-id:kurtosis com.kurtosistech.container-type:kurtosis-logs-aggregator]
  Caused by: Expected to find port specs label 'com.kurtosistech.ports' but none was found
```

author: parithosh
content: can you make sure there are no running containers (use docker stop ....) and then try a docker system prune -a && docker volume prune -a? then kurtosis engine restart? this should be a clean slate

author: radekkapka
content: Unfortunately it didn't help. I also restarted my computer but I still see the same error

author: parithosh
content: cc <@412614104222531604> or <@394701976077860865> ? Jihoon also had issues with docker desktop yesterday. Orbstack worked for him tho (is also what bbusa and i use)

author: barnabasbusa
content: can you prune all images again, and see if you can remove any leftover random docker networks?

author: tedinho.
content: Hey, can you try the steps outlined in this issue, seems to be the same error: https://github.com/kurtosis-tech/kurtosis/issues/2709#issuecomment-2866494635

author: radekkapka
content: Thank you <@394701976077860865> , running `docker container stop kurtosis-logs-aggregator` followed by `docker container rm kurtosis-logs-aggregator` fixed the problem
